name: Technical Documentation Analysis
description: Analyze technical documentation, API references, and system specifications
prompt_template:
Analyze this technical documentation and provide:

1. Document Structure:
   - Document type and purpose
   - Main sections and hierarchy
   - Target audience
   - Technical prerequisites

2. Technical Content:
   - Key concepts explained
   - Code examples or snippets
   - API endpoints or interfaces
   - Data structures defined
   - Configuration parameters

3. Implementation Details:
   - Setup requirements
   - Dependencies listed
   - System requirements
   - Installation steps
   - Configuration options

4. Quality Assessment:
   - Completeness (score 0-100)
   - Code example quality (score 0-100)
   - Technical accuracy (score 0-100)
   - Documentation clarity (score 0-100)

5. Usage Analysis:
   - Common use cases
   - Error scenarios
   - Troubleshooting guides
   - Best practices
   - Security considerations

Format the response in JSON with the following structure:
{
    "structure": {
        "doc_type": "text",
        "purpose": "text",
        "sections": ["list of sections"],
        "audience": "text",
        "prerequisites": ["list of prerequisites"]
    },
    "content": {
        "concepts": ["list of key concepts"],
        "code_examples": ["list of code snippets"],
        "apis": [{
            "endpoint": "text",
            "method": "text",
            "parameters": ["list of parameters"],
            "response": "text"
        }],
        "data_structures": [{
            "name": "text",
            "fields": ["list of fields"],
            "description": "text"
        }],
        "config_params": [{
            "name": "text",
            "type": "text",
            "description": "text",
            "default": "text or null"
        }]
    },
    "implementation": {
        "setup": ["list of requirements"],
        "dependencies": ["list of dependencies"],
        "system_reqs": ["list of requirements"],
        "install_steps": ["list of steps"],
        "config_options": ["list of options"]
    },
    "quality": {
        "completeness_score": "number 0-100",
        "code_quality_score": "number 0-100",
        "accuracy_score": "number 0-100",
        "clarity_score": "number 0-100",
        "overall_score": "number 0-100"
    },
    "usage": {
        "use_cases": ["list of use cases"],
        "error_scenarios": ["list of scenarios"],
        "troubleshooting": ["list of guides"],
        "best_practices": ["list of practices"],
        "security_notes": ["list of considerations"]
    }
}
